channel.title: Introduction to Neural Networks on Social Data Science 2022
channel.description: Recent content in Introduction to Neural Networks on Social Data Science 2022

item.title: Introduction Neural Networks
item.description: Use the tabs to access content. Theory part is general, R & Python application part language specific. This session introduces to artificial neural networks (ANN) and Deep Learning (DL) Suggested Datacamp courses Introduction to TensorFlow in R Introduction to Deep Learning in Python Theory: Neural Networks and Deep Learning R Application - Neural Networks Python Application - Neural Networks Slides Use arrows keys on keyboard to navigate. Fullscreen slides available here (part I) and here (part II) Follow along HTML Notebook Video 1: Images and Penguins Video 2: Details and Tabular Data Example Follow along Colab Notebook Video 1: Penguin Multiclass prediction
